New Note Bar Fixed an occasional issue with the contextual menu rendering Removed all caps from collaboration alert title Fixed issue where notices wouldn t be shown in some cases Fixed an issue where tags would not be deleted on trashed notes Improved dynamic font size support in notices
Simplenote s Icons have been revamped Added in app notifications to alert users of different activities in the app Changed search sort settings to use the general sort setting.
VoiceOver now reads note contextual actions names correctly
Fixed a bug that caused a crash while accessing some searched notes.
Updated new note and collaborate icons Updated tags editor Updated sort bar Removed trailing comma from tags when used as delimiter
Added support for keyboard navigation and shortcuts
Added account verification screen Updated minimum row height when note list is in condensed mode Updated tags editing experience
New passcode interface Fixed a bug that caused a crash while searching Fixed predictive text entry when working with tags

Typing will now allow you to pick Interlinking Notes right from the editor Searching for a note is showing relevant excerpts Added Search Minimap to quickly navigate search hits Tags List now extend to the edge of the screen in landscape mode Fixed a bug that affected Text Selection Fixed a bug that toggled Edition while dragging the Editor Fixed an issue that caused changes not to be persisted immediately Fixed a bug that affected search highlight navigation

New Note History interface New Note Options interface New Note Information interface Updated Navigation Bar s behavior Adjusted Notes List Metrics Fixed a bug that caused the Search Bar to look extra big Fixed a bug affecting Tags Autocomplete
Fixed a bug that affected scrolling in iOS 14 Added a link to help in Settings and About

Fixed a bug that prevented adding collaborators with email addresses that contain new TLDs Swiping a Note in the List now reveals the Copy Internal Link Action Long Pressing over an Internal Link now pushes the target Note iOS 12 is now the minimum supported OS Password AutoFill is now the preferred way to manage your credentials
Fixed a stability issue in the Notes Editor Swiping a Note in the List now reveals the Copy Internal Link Action
Updated Tags limit to up to 256 characters
Fixed a bug that caused text selection to unexpectedly scroll to the top or bottom of the document.
Fixed several layout issues that affected the Editor Now it s possible to interactively drag the Scroll Bar within the Editor
New darker dark mode
New Privacy Notice for California Users
Fixed a bug that affected the Share Extension s Appearance. Fixed RTL support in the Authentication Screens. Fixed RTL support in the Tags Editor.

Updated Password Strength requirements. Simplenote will request to upgrade insecure passwords whenever you login. Implemented a new color palette! The checklist button is hidden unless actively editing a note.
Adding support for Persian Language.
Fixed an issue that caused the Notes List to show up incorrectly in Right to Left languages.

Improved integration with iOS gets you into the app smoothly: Simplenote s launch screen now matches your iOS Appearance Settings. And it supports Password Autofill so logging in has never been faster. Taking notes is only half the battle finding the note you need when you need it is the other half and a bunch of search improvements will help you do that: Search results now display matching tags search supports tag:keyword search parameters to help you find notes whose tags contain specific keywords and search is now diacritic insensitive so you can enter search terms with or without accents and still get matches. You can also alter the order of search results right from your Notes List. Fancy! Continued visual upgrades make usability better and better: the search bar no longer displays when the Trash Filter is active and previews have been upgraded to fit more content on the screen. And as always a few bug fixes: bugs stopping Search Mode from dismissing properly and another that caused the keyboard s appearance not to match the selected theme are no more.
Simplenote just got brand new App Icons! Fixed a bug that affected tap detections over links.
Simplenote just got brand new App Icons! Fixed a bug that affected tap detections over links.

Fixed a bug that prevented users from repositioning the caret in the Email field Login SignUp . Fixed a bug that caused the Markdown Preview UI to get dismissed accidentally. Fixed an issue that might crash the app with a specific emojis combination. Fixed a bug that caused notes with specific emoji sequences to crash the app

Fixed a bug that prevented users from repositioning the caret in the Email field Login SignUp . Fixed a bug that caused the Markdown Preview UI to get dismissed accidentally. Fixed an issue that might crash the app with a specific emojis combination.

Fixed a bug that prevented users from repositioning the caret in the Email field Login SignUp . Fixed a bug that caused the Markdown Preview UI to get dismissed accidentally. Fixed an issue that might crash the app with a specific emojis combination.

Fixed a bug that caused the StatusBar to be hidden when Simplenote s Settings were displayed Fixed a bug that caused Swipe to Dismiss gesture not to properly work in the Editor Fixed a bug that allowed Peek and Pop to open notes in the Trash.
Simplenote just got brand new Icons! Sidebar s UX has been entirely refreshed.

Search Bar is now looking better than ever! Notes List refreshed to display Pinned state on the right hand side. iOS 11 Is now the minimum supported OS. Fixed a bug in which the Editor Colors might not be properly initialized.
We have redesigned the screens for getting started and logging into the app. You can now use Peek and Pop to on the notes list screen.
We have redesigned the screens for getting started and logging into the app. You can now use Peek and Pop to on the notes list screen.

Simplenote now works with Siri shortcuts allowing you to open the app open existing notes and create new notes directly from Siri. New Swipe Actions are available in the Notes List: Pin and Share! The Notes List now displays an icon showing notes that have been published. When sharing to the WordPress App Notes will no longer be block quoted. The iOS share extension UI has been completely updated. Fixed a bug that caused the Notes List to get clipped when Swipe Actions are used.
The Notes List can now be sorted by creation and modification dates.
The Notes List can now be sorted by creation and modification dates.
Fixes an issue related to tag auto complete.
Fixes issues related to selecting text in the note editor.
A better way to keep track of your tasks Check! We ve added an all new Checklists feature to the app. Look for the new button in the editor toolbar to add a Checklist to your notes. Happy noting!
You can now sort the tags list alphabetically from Settings. Character count is now displayed in the note info panel.
The dark theme is now darker. Links are easier to manage in the note editor.

We ve added a new timeout option to the passcode lock which comes in handy if you often copy paste content from other apps to Simplenote. You also now have the option to opt out from sharing analytics. Look for it in the Privacy section of Settings.
Fixes a crash that could occur when viewing note history.
We ve added a new About screen to the app. Check it out!
You can now sign in to Simplenote using your WordPress.com account!
What s New: iPhone X layout fixes Markdown preview style improvements
Safety first! The app now checks for any unsynced notes before signing out.
What s new: Restores Editor s bounce behavior.
What s new: iPhone X Layout Fixes Simplenote s Passcode Screen now supports FaceID!
Fixed an issue that prevented the Pin Lock Screen from becoming visible.
What s new: Spotlight Search Support Refreshed User Interface Bugfixes here and there Special thanks to all of our OpenSource Contributors. Simplenote loves you!
Fixed the ActionSheet on iPad Devices New Markdown Support! Updated Sync ing Core Added Printing Capabilities to the Share Sheet Multiple bugfixes here and there!
New Markdown Support! Updated Sync ing Core Added Printing Capabilities to the Share Sheet Multiple bugfixes here and there!
Fixed a bug that prevented the Share Extension from properly posting a note.
Internal enhancements and stability improvements.
Brand new Share Extension!. Now you can create new notes from anywhere. Fixed an iPad Pin Lock glitch. Fixed a bug that affected Tag Autocomplete New iPad Pro Icons
Brand new Share Extension!. Now you can create new notes from anywhere. Fixed an iPad Pin Lock glitch. Fixed a bug that affected Tag Autocomplete New iPad Pro Icons
Fixed a crash triggered after pressing date events.
Bugfixes and stability improvements.
Fixed issue that caused syncing to stall.

Brand iOS 9 Multitasking support to help you boost your productivity! Background Sync will now keep your notes up to date even when the app is not onscreen. Dramatically optimized performance when editing large notes. Simplenote is now localized in over 19 languages. We got new beautiful icons! Lots and lots of bugfixes and internal enhancements. Thanks to all of our user for your feedback!
Fixed a bug in which the passcode would get rendered out of place. Fixed a Dictation bug in iOS 8.
Added support for 1Password on Signup and SignIn screens Added missing translations for Spanish users Updated the Auto Bullets behavior Lots of internal improvements and fixes!
Internal stability enhancements.
New Dark Theme. Added TouchID Support. Bugfixes and stability improvements.
Support for bigger screen resolutions. Fixed a bug that caused old notes not to properly sync.
Fixes a bug that might cause certain notes to stop syncing.
Internal Syncing Bugfixes.
Fixed an iOS 8 bug that clipped the current note s text. Fixed a bug that prevented signup or login with special domains. Updated SourceSans font. Improved Security and Stability.
Fixed a bug that might affect sync ing while connected to unstable networks. Fixed a crash that affected devices getting reconnected. Internal enhancements.
Bugfixes and sync improvements.
Stability and Syncing Improvements.
Important update with improvements and fixes for syncing.

Simplenote is now localized for Italian Japanese and Swedish. Added support for the system text size setting. Go to Settings App General Text Size to adjust the preference. Added an option to sort notes alphabetically. Added support for up down arrows when using an external bluetooth keyboard. Fixed an issue where the app might not request a passcode when necessary. Fixed emailing and messaging notes on iPhone 5s. Fixed a possible crash when adding a tag to a note.
Fixed a potential problem with syncing notes.

Adjusted type sizes to make text easier to see. Fixed a cursor selection issue. It should now be far easier to place the cursor where you want. Fixed an issue where entering text from certain system keyboards could cause the text to scroll out of view. The tag entry field is no longer missing when creating a new note from the note editor. Various other bug fixes including fixes related to syncing.
An all new Simplenote.
Fixed a crash affecting some users.
Fixed a problem some people experienced with the app freezing during syncing
Fixed a crash that could happen if you empty the trash or delete notes from certain 3rd party apps.
Fixed a problem that could result in data loss when working offline. Fixed a problem that could cause notes to be moved to the trash. Fixed a problem with note publishing.

Fixed a display problem when using iPad in landscape mode. Removed the graphical chrome around the iPad interface. Fixed contacts not loading in the tag interface permission will now be requested in iOS 6 to access contacts for sharing . Fixed a tag related crash affecting some users. Re added support for upside down rotation for iPad.

3.1.1 changes: fixed a problem where lists don t sync correctly fixed inability to disable ads for paid users fixed a crash with iOS versions less than 4.0 fixed passcode lock starting locked for some people first list item is now treated like a title premium fixed problem where tags might not sync if you have more than 50 of them fixed currently visible list hanging around after you sign out fixed strange tag getting created if you tap Done while a tag cell is highlighted 3.1.0 changes: Added option to lock the app with a passcode Improved tags and sharing tags can now be added to a note via autocompletion you can tag people email addresses and the note will be shared with those people automatically you can add people to a tag to create a group tag notes with a group tag get shared with everyone in the group automatically tags can be renamed tag syncing is greatly improved Dropbox syncing premium only for now configured through the web app Basic support for lists premium only for now easily turn any note into a list accessed in the note info screen list items can be edited inline list items can be rearranged by dragging list items can be crossed off by swiping lists are stored as plaintext for compatibility Fixes fixed an intermittent crash when the note list updates fixed slowdown when typing in larger notes fixed toolbar sometimes disappearing when using versions fixed not being able to use spaces in passwords word count now reports actual count rather than an estimate improved note list preview for notes that have a single paragraph of content removed redundancy in note list previews when viewing notes by tag fixed occasional display problems with note info fixed published notes erroneously disabling the sharing button

This is a big update with lots of fixes and a couple new features: Added option to lock the app with a passcode Improved tags and sharing tags can now be added to a note via autocompletion you can tag people email addresses and the note will be shared with those people automatically you can add people to a tag to create a group tag notes with a group tag get shared with everyone in the group automatically tags can be renamed tag syncing is greatly improved Dropbox syncing premium only for now configured through the web app Basic support for lists premium only for now easily turn any note into a list accessed in the note info screen list items can be edited inline list items can be rearranged by dragging list items can be crossed off by swiping lists are stored as plaintext for compatibility Fixes fixed an intermittent crash when the note list updates fixed slowdown when typing in larger notes fixed toolbar sometimes disappearing when using versions fixed not being able to use spaces in passwords word count now reports actual count rather than an estimate improved note list preview for notes that have a single paragraph of content removed redundancy in note list previews when viewing notes by tag fixed occasional display problems with note info fixed published notes erroneously disabling the sharing button
